H0.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. Mongolia

H1.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. Bhutan

H2.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. Nepal

H3.text: What de-facto independent country does China claim ownership of. 臺灣

A4.text: The People's Republic of China (PRC) claims that Taiwan is Chinese territory and that the PRC replaced the ROC government in 1949, becoming the sole legal government of China.
